title: Tiny bitmap sans from website
content:
I know I’ve seen it and probably have it but I can’t remember where it is...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |

 [‹ (x) Text on Pokemon trading cards - Gill Sans {Rainer, Scott Leyes}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202194014/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36569 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Tate Modern logo - custom designed {Conor} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202194014/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36520 "Go to next forum topic")
author: joesomebody

comments.content: It looks similar to [standard 07\_55 from miniml](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202194014/http:/miniml.com/fonts/font/standard_07_55/index.htm), but the M is thinner.
